description: {{Nihongo|'''Akari Nanawo'''|ナナヲ アカリ|Nanawo Akari|born November 12, 1995}} is a Japanese musician and YouTuber from [[Osaka Prefecture]] who is signed to [[Sony Music Entertainment Japan|Sony Music Associated Records]]. Starting her career as an independent musician in 2011, Akari gained a following performing at various live houses in Japan, as well as through uploading songs on the website [[Niconico]]. She was also cast in a [[stage play]] adaptation of the mobile game ''[[Fate/Grand Order]]''. She made her major debut in 2018, performing the opening theme to the [[anime]] television series ''[[Happy Sugar Life]]''. She released her first full album in October of that year.
